name: PublishInvoice
description:
Publish a draft invoice with Square, updating its status.

This tool publishes a specified draft invoice using Square's service, updating its status and triggering configured actions such as sending emails or charging stored cards. The tool should be called when an invoice needs to be finalized and sent or processed according to its settings.

parameters.name: invoice_id
parameters.description: The ID of the draft invoice that you wish to publish. This ID uniquely identifies the invoice within the system.

value_schema.description: The ID of the invoice to publish.

parameters.name: invoice_version
parameters.description: Specify the current version number of the invoice to publish. This must match the existing invoice version to avoid rejection.

value_schema.description:
The version of the [invoice](entity:Invoice) to publish.
This must match the current version of the invoice; otherwise, the request is rejected.

parameters.name: unique_request_identifier
parameters.description: A unique string to identify the `PublishInvoice` request. If omitted or empty, each request is treated as independent. Refer to the Square documentation on idempotency for more information.

value_schema.description:
A unique string that identifies the `PublishInvoice` request. If you do not 
provide `idempotency_key` (or provide an empty string as the value), the endpoint 
treats each request as independent.

For more information, see [Idempotency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/idempotency).
